Experience French savoir-faire in
Singapore Voilah!
Discover the soul of France in the heart of Singapore and join us at VOILAH! French Festival this April and May. Celebrate 120 years of French Cinema, sway to the riffs of Thibault Cauvin and be enchanted by graceful ballet repertoires accompanied by a glass of Perrier-Jouët.
VOILAH! <[[http://voilah.sg/]]>
So much to look forward to
<[[http://voilah.sg/gaumont-120/]]>
120 YEARS OF FRENCH CINEMA HISTORY
Gaumont, the World’s First Film Company exhibits French cinema history and culture at the National Design Centre.
Tickets are limited so sign up today <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_Perrier-Jouet-Experience-French-Voilah_Page---Ticket-Registraiton.html]]> and join us on the 19 April.
<[[http://voilah.sg/t-cauvin/]]>
THIBAULT CAUVIN IN SINGAPORE
Thibault Cauvin is one of the most sought after French guitar artist of our time. Be enchanted by classical tones and discover the very best of French music school.
Tickets are limited so sign up today <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_Perrier-Jouet-Experience-French-Voilah_Page---Ticket-Registraiton.html]]> and join us on the 13 May.
<!-- -->
<[[http://voilah.sg/superstar-ballet/]]>
Voilah! presents Superstars of Ballet in Singapore
The top 12 principal ballet dancers of the world perform French ballet repertoires. Perrier-Jouët invites two lucky couples to be part of the great show.
Join our lucky draw <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_Perrier-Jouet-Experience-French-Voilah_Page---Lucky-Draw.html]]> for the chance to win 2x pair of tickets for the Superstars of Ballet.
